mapper.insert: insert into ecs_vehicle (vehicle_id, vehicle_model, producing_area, route_id, manufacture_date, purchasing_date, remark) values (#{vehicleId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{vehicleModel,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{producingArea,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{routeId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{manufactureDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{purchasingDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{remark,jdbcType=VARCHAR})
mapper.update: update ecs_vehicle set vehicle_model = #{vehicleModel,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, producing_area = #{producingArea,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, route_id = #{routeId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, manufacture_date = #{manufactureDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, purchasing_date = #{purchasingDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, remark = #{remark,jdbcType=VARCHAR} where vehicle_id = #{vehicleId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
mapper.select: select vehicle_id, vehicle_model, producing_area, route_id, manufacture_date, purchasing_date, remark from ecs_vehicle where vehicle_id = #{vehicleId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
select vehicle_id, vehicle_model, producing_area, route_id, manufacture_date, purchasing_date, remark from ecs_vehicle
